review: My father had visited the hospital, he had heart problems and was diabetic. Doctor was **** *** friendly. I can definitely recommend doctor to my family or friends. My dad was hospitalized and medication was given. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. ******* ********* *** **** ***** There was no waiting time in the hospital. Diet was suggested.

I had consulted the doctor as I had diabetes. ****** *** ***** I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Medical tests were done. There was waiting time in the hospital, it was more than 30 minutes. Diet was suggested by dietician.

I had met the doctor as I had neck pain. ********* *** **** ** ******* He is an experienced doctor and explained clearly. I can definitely recommend doctor to my family or friends. He easily identified problem and addressed them clearly. I had vitamin deficiency. Doctor prescribed tablets for 3 months. Medical tests were done. There was waiting time in the hospital, it was for 2 hours as doctor was busy. Physiotherapy and exercise were suggested.

My wife had been to hospital and it was for health issue. ********* *** **** ** ******. Medical tests were taken. I can definitely recommend doctor to my family or friends. There was some waiting time in the hospital when we went.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. R. Sundararaman Sir is giving excellent treatment for my mother. We are all satisfied with his treatment. I refer  everyone to see him for your health problems. It will be cured surely. Thank u very much doctor. He is God gift to the patient.
